Translations.Text: Tsey (lysty) dokazy tsʹoho svyatoho pysannya; hlybokyy Quran
Zvychayno, tsey khto disbelieved pobazhaye vony submitters
Dozvolyayutʹ yim hostyatʹsya, polyublyayutʹ, ta zalyshayutʹsya blinded wishful myslennyam; vony znaydutʹ
My nikoly ne vynyshchyly budʹ-yaku spilʹnotu, krim u vidpovidnosti do spetsyfichnu, predetermined chas
kinetsʹ budʹ-yakoyi spilʹnoty mozhe nikoly ne buty vnesenyy, ne zabaryvsya
Vony skazaly, "O vy kotri otrymaly tse reminder, vy ye bozhevilʹni
Chomu vy ne znyzhuyete anhely, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
My ne posylayemo vnyz anhely krim dlya spetsyfichnykh funktsiy. Inakshe, niyakyy kozhnyy ne bude respited
Absolyutno, my vidkryly reminder, ta, absolyutno, my zberzhemo tse
My poslaly (kur'yery) pered tym, yak vy do spilʹnot ranishe
Kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav yim, vony ridiculed yo
My takym chynom kontrolyuyemo rozum vynuvati
Otzhe, vony ne mozhutʹ viryty v yomu. Tse ye systemoyu z mynulykh heneratsiy
Navitʹ yakshcho my vidkryly dlya nykh vorota u nebo, cherez kotre vony pidnimayutʹsya
vony skazhutʹ, "Nashi ochi buly obmanuti. My bewitched
My rozmistyly galaxies u nebi, ta prykrasyly tse dlya beholders
Ta my pylʹnuvaly tse proty kozhnoho vidkynutoho chorta
Yakshcho budʹ-yaki yim pidkradayetʹsya navkolo shchob poslukhaty, mohutniy projectile budutʹ peresliduvaty yoho nazad
Yak dlya zemli, my skonstruyuvaly tse, ta rozmishchene na tse stabilizers (hory), ta my vyrosly na tse doskonalyy balans vse
My vstyhly habitable dlya vas, ta dlya stvorinʹ vy ne zabezpechuyete
YE nichoho shcho my ne volodiyemo neobmezhenymy sumamy tut. Ale my posylayemo tse vnyz u akuratniy miri
Ta my posylayemo viter tomu shcho pollinators, ta vyklykayutʹ vodu prybuty vnyz z neba dlya vas vypyty. Inakshe, vy ne mohly utrymaty tse palatable
Tse - my kotryy kontrolʹ zhyttya ta smertʹ, ta my yavlyayemo soboyu ostatochni inheritors
Ta my tsilkom znayemo ts sered vas kotrykh vnosyte, ta my tsilkom znayemo tsey kotryy rehres
Vash Lord bezsumnivno sklykaye yikh. Vin ye Naybilʹsh Mudryy, Omniscient
My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy buduchy z aged hryazyuka, lyubymo hlynu honchara
Yak dlya jinns, my utvoryly yikh, pered shcho, z palayuchoho vohnyu
Vash Lord skazav anhelam, "ya stvoryuyu lyudsʹkyy buduchy z aged hryazyuka, lyublyu hlynu honchara
Odnoho "razu I doskonalyy yo, ta udar u yoho z Moho dukh, vy budete vpasty prostrate pered tym, yak yo
anhely upaly prostrate; usi
krim Iblis (Satan). Vin vidmovyvsya buty z prostrators
Vin skazav, "O Iblis (Satan), chomu vy ne z prostrators
Vin skazav, "ya ne mushu prostrate pered lyudsʹkyy buduchy, komu Vy stvoryuvaly z aged hryazyuka, lyubyte hlynu honchara
Vin skazav, "Tomu, vy povynni vyyty; vy vyhanyayetesʹ
Vy zaznaly Moho osudu do Dnya Vyroku
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, respite meni do dnya vony resurrected
Vin skazav, "Vy respited
Do vstanovlenoho dnya ta razu
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, z Vy willed shcho ya zablukayusya, ya budu bezsumnivno entice yim na zemli; YA poshlyu yim vsim astray
Krim tsʹoho sered Vashoho worshipers khto prysvyachuyetesʹ absolyutno do Vas yedynykh
Vin skazav, "Tse ye zakon tse nedotorkano
Vy ne mayete enerhetychnoho nad Moyimy sluzhbovtsyamy. Vy tilʹky mayete potuzhnistʹ nad strayers khto sliduyete za vamy
Ta Peklo ochikuye yikh vsikh
Tse bude maty sim bramy. Kozhni vorota otrymayutʹ spetsyfichnu aktsiyu z nykh
Yak dlya spravedlyvi, vony otrymayutʹ nasolodu vid parku ta pruzhyn
Vstupayutʹ tam, myrolyubnyy ta zabezpechuyutʹ
My usuyemo vsi revnoshchiv z yikhnikh serdenʹok. Lyubitʹ odnu rodynu, vony budutʹ na sumizhnomu vbranni
Nikoly ne budutʹ vony zaznayutʹ budʹ-yakoyi vtomy tam; nikoly ne budutʹ vony evicted zvidty
Informuyu Moyikh sluzhbovtsiv shcho ya yavlyayu soboyu Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Ta shcho Miy retribution yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh bolisnyy retribution
Informuyutʹ yikh pro Abraham hosti
Koly vony vnesly yoho kvartaly, vony skazaly, "Myr." Vin skazav, "My apprehensive pro vas
Vony skazaly, "Ne apprehensive. My mayemo harnu novynu dlya vas: vysvitlenyy syn
Vin skazav, "Yak vy mozhete daty meni taka harna novyna, koly ya mozhu ye tak staryy? Vy dosi dayete meni tsya harna novyna
Vony skazaly, harna novyna my dayemo vy ye virni; ne rozpach
Vin skazav, "Nikhto vidchayi yoho myloserdya Lorda, krim strayers
Vin skazav, "Shcho vasha misiya, O kur'yery
Vony skazaly, "My vidpravlyayemosya do vynuvatykh lyudey
Yak dlya rodyny Doli, my vryatuyemo yikh vsikh
Ale ne yoho druzhyna; vona destined buty z pryrechenyy
kur'yery poyikhaly do mista Doli
Vin skazav, "Vy ye nevidomi lyudy
Vony skazaly, "My prynosymo do vas shcho vony maly sumniv
My prynosymo do vas pravda; my ye pravdyvi
Vy budete vzyaty vashu rodynu pid chas nochi. Zalyshtesya pozadu nykh, ta perekonuyetesya shcho zhoden z vas pohlyady nazad. Poyidʹte pryamo yak nakazane
My dostavyly yomu tse komanda: tsi lyudy musyatʹ buty vynyshcheni u ranku
lyudy mista prybuly joyfully
Vin skazav, "Tse - moyi hosti; ne zbentezhte meni
Bo BOHA, ta ne sorom meni
Vony skazaly, my ne nakazaly vam z kontaktuyuchykh budʹ khto
Vin skazav, "Osʹ moyi dochky, yakshcho vy povynni
Ale, na zhalʹ!, vony povnistyu blinded yikhnim lust
Otzhe, lykho vrazyty yikh u ranku
My povernuly tse upside vnyz, ta showered yim z spustoshlyvymy skelyamy
Tse ye urok dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Tse bude zavzhdy yavlyaty soboyu systemu
Tse ye znak dlya viruyuchiv
lyudy lisiv takozh porushnyky
Otzhe, my avenged z nykh, ta obydva spilʹnoty tsilkom documented
lyudy Alʹ-Hijr disbelieved kur'yery
My daly yim nashi vidkryttya, ale vony disregarded yim
Vony zvychayno vyrizaly nadiyni domivky z hor
lykho udaryayutʹ yikh u ranku
Shcho vony prykhovaly ne dopomohly yim
My ne utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, krim dlya spetsyfichnoyi mety. Kinetsʹ svitu prybude, tak obroblyayutʹ yikh z velykodushnoyu znevahoyu
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Creator, Omniscient
My daly vam sim pary, ta velyki Quran
Ne budemo revnyvyy shcho my podaruvaly inshyy (kur'yery), ta ne budemo zasmucheni (disbelievers), ta nyzhche vashe krylo dlya viruyuchiv
Ta proholoshuyutʹ: "YA yavlyayu soboyu ochevydnyy warner
My budemo maty spravu z dividers
Vony vyznayutʹ Quran tilʹky chastkovo
vashym Lordom, my dopytayemo yikh vsikh
pro vse vony zrobyly
Tomu, vykonuyete zamovy dani vam, ta disregard idolu worshipers
My zekonomymo vas mockers
khto vstanovlyuvav inshoho boha bilya BOHA. Vony bezsumnivno znaydutʹ
My znayemo povni dobre shcho vy mozhete buty rozdratovani yikhnimy vyslovamy
Vy budete zaspivaty pokhvaly vashoho Lorda, ta budete z prostrators
Ta obozhnyuyutʹ vashoho Lorda, aby dosyahnuty certainty
